introduction.html:div: Babel is a set of tools to make the job of globalizing Eclipse projects easier. We also want to provide ways for people world wide, who are interested, to contribute translations in their language of choice.

target_environments.html:div:
Babel translations are platform independent. However, they have been tested on the following platforms:
Microsoft Windows Vista, x86-32, Win32
Microsoft Windows XP, x86-32, Win32
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5.0, x86-32, GTK

internationalization.html:div: Babel translations are available in the languages supported by Babel. However, participation may vary.
